join_message:
Thank you for adding me to your dear server! The following commands are **very useful**:
 
• **mt.language <en-us/pt-br>** | Change bot language
• **mt.timezone <-12 to 12>** | TimeZone offset
**• mt.spoiler <on/off>** | Enable to hide team scores
 
See more commands using **mt.help**
Bugs, suggestions, help and donates on **server discord**: <https://cutt.ly/zybNwPh>
Vote in <https://top.gg/bot/694992068589912084/vote>
Donate in <https://donatebot.io/checkout/701168663629267005>
 
Have a good time!
more_permissions: > Oh no! I need more permissions for cool features, can you please invite-me again? Use this invite link: <https://cutt.ly/zybNwPh> {INVITE}
only_admin: :x: | {USER}, only administrators can run this command!

help_embed_fields.title: mt.notify add team <game> <team>
help_embed_fields.description: ` Add notifications for a team in a game `

help_embed_fields.title: mt.notificar remover time <jogo> <time>
help_embed_fields.description: ` Remove notifications from a team in a game `

notify_not_active: :x: | {USER}, no notification is active in this guild!
notify_game_unsupported:
:x: | {USER} | I don't have support for the game **{GAME}**. 
Supported games: CSGO - LOL - DOTA2 - RL - R6 - OW - PUBG - CODMW
notify_game_added: :white_check_mark: | {USER} | You will be notified on this channel when a match from the **{GAME}** match starts, ends, is changed!
notify_game_added_again: :x: | {USER} | You are already being notified of **{GAME}** game matches in this guild!
notify_team_limit: :x: | {USER} | The limit of registered teams has reached its maximum! ({LIMIT})
notify_team_added: :white_check_mark: | {USER} | You will be notified on this channel when a match from the **{TEAM}** team in the **{GAME}** game starts, ends or is changed!
notify_team_added_again: :x: | {USER} | You are already being notified of **{TEAM}** team matches in the **{GAME}** game in this guild!
notify_game_removed: :white_check_mark: | {USER} | **{GAME}** game match notifications have been **disabled** for this guild!
notify_game_removed_none: :x: | {USER} | There are no active **{GAME}** game notifications in this guild!
notify_team_removed: :white_check_mark: | {USER} | Notifications for **{TEAM}** team matches in the **{GAME}** game have been **disabled** on this guild!
notify_team_removed_none: :x: | {USER} | There are no match notifications for the **{TEAM}** team in the **{GAME}** game active in this guild!
notify_usage:
{USER} | Use: 
• mt.notify info
• mt.notify channel
• mt.notify add game <game>
• mt.notifiy remove game <game>
• mt.notify add team <game> <team>
• mt.notify remove team <game> <team>
lang_unsupported: :x: | {USER} | I don't have support for **{LANG}** language! Supported languages: {LANGUAGES}
lang_equals: :x: | {USER} | The current language is already set to **{LANG}**!
lang_changed: :white_check_mark: | {USER} | The guild language has been changed to **{NEWLANG}**!
not_number: :x: | {USER} | {ARG} is not a valid number! Use a number from -12 to 12
tz_equals: :x: | {USER} | The current timezone is already set to **{TIMEZONE}**!
tz_changed: :white_check_mark: | {USER} | The guild timezone has been changed to **{NEWTIMEZONE}**!
